title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 372 - Hazardous Waste Manifest System And Related Standards For Generators, Transporters And Facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 372 - Hazardous Waste Manifest System And Related Standards For Generators, Transporters And Facilities

State Regulations
§ 372.1 - General
§ 372.2 - Standards applicable to generators of hazardous waste
§ 372.3 - Standards applicable to transporters
§ 372.4 - Reserved
§ 372.5 - International shipments and imports
§ 372.6 - Interstate shipments
§ 372.7 - Shipments by rail or water (bulk)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 372

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, art. 3, title 3, §§ 19-0301, 19-0303, 19-0304, 19-0306, 23-2305, 23-2307, 23- 2308, art. 27, §§ 27-0105, 27-0106, 27-0303, 27-0305, 27-0905, titles 7, 9, §§ 70-0107, 70-0109, 70-0115, art. 71, § 71-2201, titles 27, 35

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
